-=] ScanCore - Agent - scan-clustat
DESCRIPTION
This agent reads and parses the output from rgmanager's 'clustat' (Cluster Status) program. It will detect changes in VMs, storage, libvirtd services and nodes joining, leaving and recovering.
SWITCHES
-c <host>, --caller <host>
This is to be set by the ScanCore server and 'host' must match the FQDN of the caller. When data is recorded to the target databases, this value is used to link the data to this host. Failing to match this name to an entry in the 'hosts' table will cause the agent to exit with the return code of '1'.
-h, -?, --help
Show this dialog and exit.
